modName: Dawnguard Light Helmet to Full Helmet Replacer
summary: Changes the Dawnguard Light Helmet to look like the Dawnguard Full Helmet. Not compatible with beast races.
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE: It seems the original file was just an empty archive. I uploaded the correct one.

Quick and dirty fix to make the Dawnguard Light Helmet look like the Dawnguard Full Helmet. I am uploading this as-is and will not provide any support or listen to any requests. Not compatible with beast races.
author: Roik
